A tastefully decorated and well equipped upper level apartment with a private walk-up entrance and free parking. In the heart of Westboro Village, one of Ottawa's most desirable neighbourhoods—Enjoy a central location without the hassles of downtown. This ideal executive suite boasts a cozy bedroom and a separate office space, perfect for anyone who needs plenty of space to relax and work. A large open-concept kitchen and dining area connect to a beautiful living room with a gas fireplace and a large sun-drenched deck overlooking a backyard garden. You'll be lulled by the restful ambiance in this home on a calm cul-de-sac, but you'll also be tempted to put on your walking shoes and explore the area. Westboro's trendy village main street, with its coffee shops and specialty boutiques, is just beyond the doorstep! Welcome to your home away from home, 2 bedrooms on a quiet tree-lined street just steps to all the action of the ByWard Market, National Gallery, and easy access to embassies, shopping, Parliament, Rideau Centre, and Rideau Station on the O-Train LRT. Excellent coffee, local brunch place and fiery Caribbean chicken all at the end of the block! The open main living/dining/kitchen area makes it easy to have friends over for dinner or drinks, and 2 private bedrooms with a luxe bathroom make it easy to get the relaxation and restoration you need. You'll have the whole loft-style flat to yourself, easy access from the main floor porch. I'll be overseas during your stay, but friends and family nearby to take care of anything if needed! The ByWard Market is Ottawa's most vibrant neighbourhood, with a daily outdoor market, many specialty food stores, lots of restaurants and bars, and adjacent to the main shopping centre. Located at the northern, residential edge you get the best of both worlds

Our yurt is by the water, in our forest, on an elevated little peninsula where the Ottawa River meets the Mississippi River, just 40 min. west of Ottawa! It is at the end of a beautiful forest road, where you can park for your stay.  Yurta (Canadian designed and made) is a contemporary adaption of a traditional Mongolian yurt built for the Canadian climate. It is superbly crafted with natural, non-toxic materials, is completely weatherproof and has a minimal footprint. In the spirit of a tent, our yurt has no usual building features and no interior heat. It is 17 feet round, has 6 foot high walls and has a 10 foot ceiling at its highest point. The roof is capped with a clear, 4 foot round operable dome that vents the yurt and gives great light. The dome is easy to operate using a special pole.
